charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_020:
Now, I want an honest answer.
Do you think this outfit suits me?
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0401_040: I’m glad to hear you think so, too.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0402_060:
Hm. When you say “not bad,” that means 
that it’s somewhat becoming, right?
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_070: I’m rather fond of this suit myself.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_080: But...I also kind of feel it’s a little...too much.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_090:
While I do like it, it’s a little 
embarrassing at the same time.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_140:
Apparently, this sygna suit was designed to give
Trainers a stronger connection to their Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_150:
I’m not familiar with fashion, 
but some so-called famous designer 
was very insistent that I wear this suit.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_160:
And here’s the weird thing: when I’m wearing
this outfit, I feel like I’ve become Tyranitar.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_170:
I’ve been training with Tyranitar for a 
while now. I would trust him with my life.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_180:
And before I started wearing this suit, 
I thought we perfectly understood each other.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_190: But once I put on this outfit...
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_200:
I feel like I can feel the same things he does.
Like I know exactly what he wants me to do
with incredible clarity.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_210: At least that’s how it feels.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_220:
If I can focus on honing this sensation 
to perfection, Tyranitar and I should be 
able to reach new heights!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_230:
This sygna suit made me feel the possibility
of becoming even closer to my Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0401_250: As a fellow Trainer, I agree.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0302_260: I want to wear it, too!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_0402_270:
As a fellow Trainer, I can understand
the sentiment.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_280: Tyranitar is known as the Armor Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_290:
This sygna suit is my armor! Now, Tyranitar
and I can fight even closer than ever!
charaepi_ch0015_01_takeshi/2301_1201_310:
Now that I have this sygna suit, don’t think 
we are the same as we were before.
We are stronger than you could imagine!
